About Me.
My name is Samuel Micallef and I am a student Studying Computer Science (Software Engineering) at the University of Wollongong Australia. I am going into my final year of study and I plan to complete my degree in November 2021.

I have a proficient level of experience and understanding of the following technologies Java, HTML, CSS, SCSS (sass), JavaScript, JSON, AJAX, SQL and C++. I may not know everything, but what I can guarantee is that I am a lightning-fast learner who is able to quickly develop a solid and practical understanding of any tool or technology presented. In addition to this, I am an excellent problem solver who loves to work with others to achieve an exceed expected results.

Website Designed, Developed and Implemented by Samuel Micallef.
